Title: Vite's `server.fs.deny` did not deny requests for patterns with directories.
Description: [Vite dev server option](https://vitejs.dev/config/server-options.html#server-fs-deny) `server.fs.deny` did not deny requests for patterns with directories. An example of such a pattern is `/foo/**/*`.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.7.0 before 2.9.18, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.2.10, all versions starting from 4.0.0 before 4.5.3, all versions starting from 5.0.0 before 5.0.13, all versions starting from 5.1.0 before 5.1.7, all versions starting from 5.2.0 before 5.2.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.7.0, all versions starting from 2.9.18 before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.2.10 before 4.0.0, all versions starting from 4.5.3 before 5.0.0, all versions starting from 5.0.13 before 5.1.0, all versions starting from 5.1.7 before 5.2.0, all versions starting from 5.2.6
